processingCommand.script:
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3
:SET &TARGET_KEYSTORE_FILE# = ""
:SET &AFSM_SERVER_AGENT# = ""
:SET &SERVER_AGENT# = ""

:IF &KEYSTORE_FILE# <> ""
:  SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&KEYSTORE_FILE#, '/')
:  SET &POS# = &POS# + 1
:  SET &KEYSTORE_FILENAME# = SUBSTR(&KEYSTORE_FILE#, &POS#)
:  SET &TARGET_KEYSTORE_FILE# = "/opt/jda/wm/certificate/&KEYSTORE_FILENAME#"
:ENDIF

:FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&AFSM_MANAGEMENT_SERVER#,".")
:SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:SET &AFSM_SERVER_AGENT# = "&AGENT_UC#.os"

:FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SERVER_NAME#,".")
:SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:SET &SERVER_AGENT# = "&AGENT_UC#.os"

:PUBLISH &AFSM_SERVER_AGENT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &SERVER_AGENT#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &TARGET_KEYSTORE_FILE#,,WORKFLOW
